input.sentences: [female] was from a wealthy family that liked to travel .
[male] was from a wealthy family as well .
[female] and [male] were married shortly after meeting .
they had 2 daughters | the oldest being [female] .
output.sentences: A wealthy family will travel even with the female members.
This wealthy male decided to take his family.
Shortly after meeting his wife he married her and began his family.
His female family members contained a daughter and two grandchildren.
His daughter named his female grandchildren after her mother.
